main.name: Erik Adames
main.description: A Data Scientist with a background in Supply Chain.
main.bio: My career began as a warehouse worker in Charlotte, NC. Due to my superb work ethic, my career progressed quickly from the warehouse in Charlotte to the global headquarters in Switzerland. When working, my focus is to be efficient which allows me to handle a large workload quickly and without errors. My last position was as a Global Project Pricing Analyst which required the managing of complex pricing projects. My projects were successful but over time an uneasy feeling starting to develop. I discovered that I wanted to work in a more dynamic and impactful field. This was the major influence that made me complete a graduate certificate in Data Science from Harvard University Extension school with the aim to work in a more technology-driven occupation. These courses reawaken my love of learning and motivated me to enhance my technical skillset further by completing a full stack web development Bootcamp. My work ethic naturally aligned with being a developer. The concept that each component is broken into small, efficient chunks that can be scaled and reused came naturally to me. This allowed me to excel in the Bootcamp. My previous work experience helped develop my dependable and superb work ethic. I am now positioned for a full-time employment opportunity and hope to hear from you soon.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Full Stack Web Developer Professional Certificate
education.description: A 24-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, NoSQL, ReactJS and Redux.
Finished the 4-course graduate level certificate with a 3.67 GPA. Relevant Coursework: Statistical Modeling, Quantitative Methods, Elements of Data Science in R, and Remote Sensing Data

education.school: University of North Carolina at Charlotte

work.company: Kuehne and Nagel Inc. - Schindellegi, Switzerland
work.title: Global Projects Pricing Analyst
work.description: Managed complex pricing projects with various distributed teams throughout the world. Ensured strict compliance with customer’s requirements, coordinated constant communication between project owners and stakeholders, resolved all conflicts between stakeholders and pricing teams, and performed a detail analysis before submitting each project.

work.company: Kuehne and Nagel Inc. - Charlotte, NC
work.title: Import and Export Air Operations
work.description: Performed the day-to-day air logistics operations for Kuehne and Nagel’s Charlotte customers. Collaborated daily with customers and created standard operating procedures (SOPs) for each customer. Performed analysis of the supply chain to identify problems and implemented corrective actions.
